text: The 2018–19 Wake Forest Demon Deacons men's basketball team represented Wake Forest University during the 2018–19 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Demon Deacons were led by fifth-year head coach Danny Manning and played their home games at the Lawrence Joel Veterans Memorial Coliseum in Winston- Salem, North Carolina as members of the Atlantic Coast Conference. ==Previous season== The Demon Deacons finished 2017–18 season 11–20, 4–14 in ACC play to finish in 14th place. They lost in the first round of the ACC Tournament to Syracuse. ==Offseason== ===Departures=== {| class="wikitable sortable" border="1" ! Name !! Number !! Pos. !! Height !! Weight !! Year !!
